channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s AI deal for Silicon Valley: Build your own nuclear, skip years of regulation
item.description: At Davos, President Donald Trump invited Silicon Valley to bypass the aging U.S. grid by building private reactors, promising to slash years of regula...

item.title: ChongLy Scott Thao, Hmong Immigrant and U.S. Citizen, Arrested by ICE
item.description: A Hmong immigrant, who is a U.S. citizen, was released after being questioned for an hour. Federal officials said they had been seeking sex offenders.

item.title: Jensen Huang says AI bubble fears are dwarfed by ‘the largest infrastructure buildout in human history’
item.description: Huang sees the AI industry as a "five-layer cake" requiring total industrial reinvention, with Nvidia's chips a particularly crunchy part of the recip...

item.title: Jamie Dimon tells Davos: ‘You didn’t do a particularly good job making the world a better place’
item.description: "What the hell else do you want me to say?"

item.title: Taiwan’s $40 Billion Military Spending Plan Stalled by Political Impasse
item.description: Taiwan’s domestic gridlock is revealing a deep-seated fracture over how the island should defend itself and how much it can depend on the United State...

item.title: Nearly 400 millionaires and billionaires across 24 countries are demanding Davos leaders to tax them more: ‘Tax us. Tax the super rich.’

item.title: Majority of Latin Americans Endorsed Trump’s Intervention In Venezuela, Polls Show
item.description: Several polls show that a majority of Latin Americans who were questioned endorsed the intervention, suggesting a shift, at least for now, from ideolo...

item.title: Prince Harry Gives Emotional Testimony About Effects of U.K. News Coverage
item.description: Harry said in court that reading articles about him published by Associated Newspapers, which he has accused of acting unlawfully, had been “traumatic...

item.title: Slipping on ICE: innocent retailers are the latest collateral damage from Trump’s perpetual noise machine
item.description: ICE is slipping on a puddle of its own making. Let's not put the rest of our crucial nationwide retailers on shaky footing.

item.title: Widespread Winter Storm Is Forecast to Bring Heavy Snow to Central and Eastern US
item.description: People across a large section of the central and eastern United States are facing predictions for heavy snow and ice starting Friday.
